name: velvet
description: A clean, minimal 1-page website for Velvet Labs - a technology studio and venture foundry building innovative software companies across healthcare, cloud infrastructure, and frontier technology.

scripts.dev: npm run css:build && concurrently "npm run css:watch" "npm run js:watch" "npm run serve"
scripts.build: npm run css:build && npm run js:build && node scripts/build.mjs
scripts.js:build: npx esbuild components.js --bundle --minify --format=iife --outfile=dist/components.js && npx esbuild main.js --bundle --minify --format=iife --outfile=dist/main.js
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run serve
